usage_description:
Here is a 2-sentence summary of what a developer can achieve with this library:

This library is used to extend and enhance various machine learning capabilities, providing additional tools and features for tasks such as feature selection, clustering, and classification. With mlxtend, developers can build more robust and accurate machine learning models by leveraging its array of pre-built functions and algorithms.
